SamPy.astronomy.conversions.convertSphericalToCartesian¶

SamPy.astronomy.conversions.convertSphericalToCartesian(r, theta, phi)¶

Converts Spherical coordinates to Cartesian ones.

http://mathworld.wolfram.com/SphericalCoordinates.html

Parameters:
  • r (float or ndarray) – radius
  • theta (float or ndarray) –
  • phi (float or ndarray) –
Returns:

x, y, z
Return type:

dictionary
